body: Mehdi, Chris will answer this one much properly, but what i'll do is the following:[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SfnwKUqQ7eCjHY66t6tSY8bZBBlJuGtC4mCzIz1w8xuG-aYXw0vkst2C484f29nSSt7i41Xz0FtajH1Opt7W1r-1hVV7J8zf/Capture.JPG)Basically you need to create a CSV file formated according to the output results of the MicroclimateMap. Then you can read it as a file and input them into the VisualizeMicroclimate. Run a case where you get such an output to see how the CSV is formated. -A.
